info.name: Len R's compact extensions list FF3_RC1
info.description:
Please donate or review if you enjoy this!
replaces style 6574

v1.7 - first RC1 version; modifies top message popups to fit in sidebar better, but with some occasional glitches
------------------------------------
v1.6.1 - restart btn fix
v1.6 - restart firefox messagebar popup
v1.5 - tighter spacing, better compression
v1.4  - smaller topbar, combines topbar and find updates; compresses status messages. cool stuff - check it out!
http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/5248/sshot1tm3.png (also = before sshot)

Puts items closer together, shrinks expanded items and install/uninstall items
Only tested on Vista 120dpi FF3 RC1, but should work on others. 
Please post any bugs to forums (not as reviews)
